data.name: The Loop Loft - Eric Harland Looped Vol. 2
data.detailed_description:
All content included is royalty-free

One of the world's elite drummers has returned. Introducing Eric Harland "Looped" Volume 2. An incredible collection of loops and samples from a drummer pushing the boundaries of music.

Following on the highly-acclaimed initial release, Eric Harland Looped Volume 2 explores even more stylistic and sonic territories. From burning uptempo bebop drums, to blazing double bass drum grooves, to swinging straight ahead brush playing, this collection is sure to inspire and compliment your next musical project.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 290 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Music Creator 6 Touch, SONAR X3 or any DAW that supports REX files
